mapper.select: select * from tblFeed order by seq desc
select h.name as hashtag from tblFeed f inner join tblFeedHashtag fh on f.seq = fh.fseq inner join tblHashtag h on fh.hseq = h.seq where f.seq = #{seq}

select f.*, m.nickname, m.image as pimage, l.likes from tblFeed f left outer join (select fseq,count(fseq) as likes from tblFeedlike group by fseq) l on f.seq = l.fseq inner join tblAccount a on f.aseq = a.seq inner join tblMember m on m.aseq = a.seq where f.seq = #{seq}

select c.*, case when a.lv = 1 then m.nickname when a.lv = 2 then s.nickname end as nickname, case when a.lv = 1 then m.image when a.lv = 2 then s.image end as image from tblFeedComment c inner join tblAccount a on c.aseq = a.seq left outer join tblMember m on m.aseq = a.seq left outer join tblShop s on s.aseq = a.seq where fseq = #{seq}
select f.*, m.nickname as nickname, m.image as pimage from tblFeed f inner join tblAccount a on f.aseq = a.seq inner join tblMember m on a.seq = m.aseq where f.aseq = #{aseq} order by f.seq desc
